We start by using required packages.

```{r}
library(r2dii.dataraw)
library(r2dii.match)
```

* [`match_name()`](https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/r2dii.match/reference/match_name.html) helps you to score the similarity between company names from a loanbook versus an asset-level dataset (ald).

```{r}
match_name(loanbook_demo, ald_demo)
```

[Learn more](https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/r2dii.match/index.html).
